Description:
Develop and implement quality assurance strategies and programs to achieve quality goals and defined standards.
Review and evaluate processes and procedures to ensure compliance with quality standards and local/international regulations.
Conduct inspections and tests on products and materials to verify their compliance with specifications and standards.
Analyze data and reports related to product and process quality and suggest improvements.
Develop and update quality procedures and work instructions to ensure continuous improvement.
Monitor adherence to safety and occupational health requirements in all aspects of work.
Provide guidance and training to teams and employees to enhance awareness of quality importance.
Interact with customers and suppliers to address their inquiries and quality requirements.
Prepare regular reports to management on product and process quality performance.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in Engineering or a related field.
In-depth knowledge of quality assurance principles and tools such as 5S, Six Sigma, ISO.
Strong analytical skills and ability to use data for informed decision-making.
Ability to identify issues and provide effective improvement solutions.
Excellent communication skills for interacting with teams, customers, and suppliers.
Commitment to safety, quality standards, and relevant regulations.
Ability to work effectively within a diverse team.
Familiarity with software tools used in quality assurance.
Organizational skills and ability to manage multiple tasks.
